channel.title: Screwdriver History on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Screwdriver History on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: We Screwed Up
item.description: Today in Tedium: Despite the name of this internet publication, I’ve never mentioned what might perhaps be the most tedious part of the world’s modern existence, the most basic of building blocks that connects every one of our devices, manufacturing processes, and likely even the chair you’re sitting in right now: The screw. It strikes me that screws are the ultimate example of objects that hide under our noses that we never think about.
